mapper.select: SELECT payment_id, user_id, card_company, card_number FROM payment_methods WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY PAYMENT_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT_METHODS(USER_ID, CARD_COMPANY, CARD_NUMBER) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{card_company}, #{card_number})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PAYMENT_METHODS WHERE PAYMENT_ID = #{payment_id} AND USER_ID = #{user_id}
